name: @slidev/theme-default
author: antfu <anthonyfu117@hotmail.com>
readme:
# @slidev/theme-default [![NPM version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@slidev/theme-default?color=3AB9D4&label=)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@slidev/theme-default) The default theme for [Slidev](https://github.com/slidevjs/slidev). ## Install Add the following frontmatter to your `slides.md`. Start Slidev then it will prompt you to install the theme automatically. 
---
theme: default
---
Learn more about [how to use a theme](https://sli.dev/themes/use). ## License MIT License Â© 2021 [Anthony Fu](https://github.com/antfu)
